svg.text: politics
Yet another episode of the "Bullwinkle and Rocky" cartoon
at Perry High School in Iowa as adolescent violence
reflects the adult violence subliminal to the politics and
media of power.
The criminal power of the campaigns of distraction,
deflection, deception, deprivation, depredation, and
destruction common and familiar to the political crimes of
the political prostitution confused and conflated with the
legislative gravity of population and wealth and its
manipulation, exploitation, and annihilation by the
narcissism, avarice, and sadism of nihilism.
Far too many succumb to the suggestion that the violence
of the crime is the public defense of the crime, a class
of phenomena represented in politics by Donald Trump and
his ilk. The crimes against humanity violate the right to
peace and dignity, a concept foreign to the familiar
egomania of criminal power. The communications of society
and politics and person coddles the cowardice and inanity
of cynicism and nihilism which constitute the annihilation
parasitism that is responsible for squandering sovereignty
to the slavery that relates addiction to carelessness and
recklessness.
References
https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/live-blog/live-updates-active-shooting-perry-high-school-rcna132235
